tool.name: qiime2 feature-table filter-features

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency]
param.help: [required] The feature table from which features should be filtered.

param.name: min_frequency
param.label: min_frequency: Int
param.help: [default: 0] The minimum total frequency that a feature must have to be retained.

param.name: max_frequency
param.label: max_frequency: Int
param.help: [optional] The maximum total frequency that a feature can have to be retained. If no value is provided this will default to infinity (i.e., no maximum frequency filter will be applied).

param.name: min_samples
param.label: min_samples: Int
param.help: [default: 0] The minimum number of samples that a feature must be observed in to be retained.

param.name: max_samples
param.label: max_samples: Int
param.help: [optional] The maximum number of samples that a feature can be observed in to be retained. If no value is provided this will default to infinity (i.e., no maximum sample filter will be applied).

repeat.name: metadata
repeat.help: [optional] Feature metadata used with `where` parameter when selecting features to retain, or with `exclude_ids` when selecting features to discard.
repeat.title: metadata: Metadata

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: where: Str
param.help: [optional] SQLite WHERE clause specifying feature metadata criteria that must be met to be included in the filtered feature table. If not provided, all features in `metadata` that are also in the feature table will be retained.

param.name: exclude_ids
param.label: exclude_ids: Bool
param.help: [default: No] If true, the features selected by `metadata` or `where` parameters will be excluded from the filtered table instead of being retained.

param.name: filter_empty_samples
param.label: filter_empty_samples: Bool
param.help: [default: Yes] If true, drop any samples where none of the retained features are present.

param.name: allow_empty_table
param.label: allow_empty_table: Bool
param.help: [default: No] If true, the filtered table may be empty. Default behavior is to raise an error if the filtered table is empty.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-table filter-features ====================================== Filter features from table
Outputs: -------- :filtered_table.qza: The resulting feature table filtered by feature.
|
Description: ------------ Filter features from table based on frequency and/or metadata. Any samples with a frequency of zero after feature filtering will also be removed. See the filtering tutorial on https://docs.qiime2.org for additional details.
Examples: ---------
filter_features_min_samples *************************** Using the ``qiime2 feature-table filter-features`` tool: #. Set *"table"* to ``#: feature-table.qza`` #. Expand the ``additional options`` section
- Set *"min_samples"* to ``2``
#. Press the ``Execute`` button.
|
